name: Hardware
description: Physical components of a computer system, such as servers, desktops, laptops, and other related devices.

name: Data Management
description: Processes and systems involved in the storage, organization, and maintenance of data, including databases and data backup solutions.

name: IP Phones
description: Internet Protocol phones used for voice communication over the internet, including setup, configuration, and troubleshooting.

name: Network
description: Infrastructure and services related to networking, such as routers, switches, firewalls, and connectivity issues.

name: Peripheral Devices
description: External devices connected to a computer, such as keyboards, mice, monitors, and external drives.

name: Power
description: Power-related issues, including power supplies, UPS systems, and electrical safety for IT equipment.

name: Printing
description: Printers and printing solutions, including setup, maintenance, and troubleshooting of printing devices.

name: Scanning
description: Scanners and related devices, including setup, maintenance, and troubleshooting of scanning equipment.

name: Software
description: Computer programs and applications, including installation, updates, licensing, and troubleshooting.

name: Domain Access
description: Issues related to domain access and permissions, including login credentials, group policies, and domain controller configurations.

name: Email
description: Email systems and services, including configuration, maintenance, and troubleshooting of email clients and servers.

name: Other
description: Miscellaneous or uncategorized IT-related issues not covered by the specific categories above.
